tafsirQuiz.question: What does this verse warn or promise?
tafsirQuiz.correctAnswer: When the Prophet Muhammad decided to proceed against Makkah, he made his plans very quietly so that the Makkans should have no advance warning. But this betrayal became known through Revelation and the messenger was caught on the way

tafsirQuiz.question: What warning or glad tiding is mentioned in Surah Al-Mumtahinah, Ayah 2?
tafsirQuiz.correctAnswer: Being a believer in Truth and at the same time having close relations with the enemies with whom one is at war is totally wrong. tafsirQuiz.question: What consequence is described in this ayah?
tafsirQuiz.correctAnswer: After he had carried out his mission and had come to the end of his arguments, when his hearers persisted in their rejection of the Truth, he completely separated himself from them

tafsirQuiz.question: What is the main message of Surah Al-Mumtahinah, Ayah 6?
tafsirQuiz.correctAnswer: As far as justice and fair play are concerned, they will be given to everybody–whether friend or foe. But having friendships with those who are at war with one is not proper

tafsirQuiz.question: What key concept does this verse highlight?
tafsirQuiz.correctAnswer: Here, allusion is made to certain Islamic rules relating to family affairs applicable in the light of the circumstances prevailing after the execution of the Hudaybiyyah Peace Treaty
